item.title:
many clients are good because more people get how the protocol works.
yes it has a cost, but in practice the largest client's voice matters most (imo) and it's fine.
if things move slow it's because somebody is not testing/benching sufficiently, not bc clients dont impl it.

item.title: what im going for: - generate scoped session key in cloudflare worker - pass the pubkey to the frontend to webauthn sign it and add it to your account using porto - your cf worker is now able to do magic with your account securely
item.dc:creator: @gakonst
item.description:
what im going for:
- generate scoped session key in cloudflare worker
- pass the pubkey to the frontend to webauthn sign it and add it to your account using porto
- your cf worker is now able to do magic with your account securely
